tool_description: Easily and quickly convert all types of measurement units using the API.
name: Measurement Units Converter
title: Measurement Units Converter

api_list.name: Convert from one unit of measure to another
api_list.description: Convert efficiently and quickly between more than 50 of the most used units with a simple and intuitive conversion tool. At the output, you will get an answer with the conversion of your measurement units.

api_list.name: Measurements
api_list.description: GET array of all types of measurement. The array key is in the format {inputUnit-outputUnit} - you can later use these values ​​when converting units of measurement.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://measurement-units-converter.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/market/conversions/measurements"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "measurement-units-converter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://measurement-units-converter.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/market/conversions/measurements"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "measurement-units-converter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
